visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the following specifications: Chart type is 'column', chart title is 'Color Distribution', axes and labels styling includes black color for labels and titles with a font size of 14px, data series includes two points named 'Point 1' and 'Point 2' with colors green and pink respectively, and custom colors are green and pink. Additional configurations include a white background, a legend positioned at the bottom, and chart margins set to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart with a specified title, axes labels, and data series. The chart type is set to 'column', and the title 'Color Distribution' is styled with a black color and a font size of 14px. The x-axis categories are 'Green' and 'Pink', and the y-axis title is 'Value', both styled with the same black color and font size. The data series includes two points, 'Point 1' with a green color and a value of 1, and 'Point 2' with a pink color and a value of 5. The chart background is set to white, and the legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart. Additionally, the chart margins are set to 50 pixels on all sides to provide adequate spacing around the chart.
